00034 void depth_first_traversal_graph_display(FILE *out, short marker_value, netlist_t *netllist);

00039 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040  * (function: graphVizOutputAst)
00041  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00042 void graphVizOutputNetlist(char* path, char* name, short marker_value, netlist_t *netlist)
00043 {
00044         char path_and_file[4096];
00045         FILE *fp;
00046 
00047         /* open the file */
00048         sprintf(path_and_file, "%s/%s.dot", path, name);
00049         fp = fopen(path_and_file, "w");
00050 
00051         /* open graph */
00052         fprintf(fp, "digraph G {\nranksep=.25;\n");
00053         
00054         depth_first_traversal_graph_display(fp, marker_value, netlist);
00055 
00056         /* close graph */
00057         fprintf(fp, "}\n");
00058         fclose(fp);
00059 }
00060 
00061 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062  * (function: depth_first_traversal_start()
00063  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00064 void depth_first_traversal_graph_display(FILE *out, short marker_value, netlist_t *netlist)
00065 {
00066         int i;
00067 
00068         /* start with the primary input list */
00069         for (i = 0; i < netlist->num_top_input_nodes; i++)
00070         {
00071                 if (netlist->top_input_nodes[i] != NULL)
00072                 {
00073                         depth_first_traverse_visualize(netlist->top_input_nodes[i], out, marker_value);
00074                 }
00075         }
00076         /* now traverse the ground and vcc pins */
00077         if (netlist->gnd_node != NULL)
00078                 depth_first_traverse_visualize(netlist->gnd_node, out, marker_value);
00079         if (netlist->vcc_node != NULL)
00080                 depth_first_traverse_visualize(netlist->vcc_node, out, marker_value);
00081 }
00082 
00083 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084  * (function: depth_first_traverse)
00085  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00086 void depth_first_traverse_visualize(nnode_t *node, FILE *fp, int traverse_mark_number)
00087 {
00088         int i, j;
00089         nnode_t *next_node;
00090         nnet_t *next_net;
00091 
00092         if (node->traverse_visited == traverse_mark_number)
00093         {
00094                 return;
00095         }
00096         else
00097         {
00098                 /* ELSE - this is a new node so depth visit it */
00099                 char *temp_string;
00100                 char *temp_string2;
00101 
00102                 /* mark that we have visitied this node now */
00103                 node->traverse_visited = traverse_mark_number;
00104                 
00105                 temp_string = make_simple_name(node->name, "^-+.", '_');
00106                 if ((node->type == FF_NODE) || (node->type == BUF_NODE))
00107                 {
00108                         fprintf(fp, "\t%s [shape=box];\n", temp_string);
00109                 }
00110                 else if (node->type == INPUT_NODE)
00111                 {
00112                         fprintf(fp, "\t%s [shape=triangle];\n", temp_string);
00113                 }
00114                 else if (node->type == CLOCK_NODE)
00115                 {
00116                         fprintf(fp, "\t%s [shape=triangle];\n", temp_string);
00117                 }
00118                 else if (node->type == OUTPUT_NODE)
00119                 {
00120                         fprintf(fp, "\t%s_O [shape=triangle];\n", temp_string);
00121                 }
00122                 else
00123                 {
00124                         fprintf(fp, "\t%s [label=\"%d:%d\"];\n", temp_string, node->forward_level, node->backward_level);
00125                 }
00126                 free(temp_string);
00127 
00128                 for (i = 0; i < node->num_output_pins; i++)
00129                 {
00130                         if (node->output_pins[i]->net == NULL)
00131                                 continue;
00132 
00133                         next_net = node->output_pins[i]->net;
00134                         for (j = 0; j < next_net->num_fanout_pins; j++)
00135                         {
00136                                 next_node = next_net->fanout_pins[j]->node;
00137                                 if (next_node == NULL)
00138                                         continue;
00139 // To see just combinational stuff...also comment above triangels and box
00140 //                              if ((next_node->type == FF_NODE) || (next_node->type == INPUT_NODE) || (next_node->type == OUTPUT_NODE))
00141 //                                      continue;
00142 //                              if ((node->type == FF_NODE) || (node->type == INPUT_NODE) || (node->type == OUTPUT_NODE))
00143 //                                      continue;
00144 
00145                                 temp_string = make_simple_name(node->name, "^-+.", '_');
00146                                 temp_string2 = make_simple_name(next_node->name, "^-+.", '_');
00147                                 if (node->type == OUTPUT_NODE)
00148                                 {
00149                                         /* renaming for output nodes */
00150                                         temp_string = (char*)realloc(temp_string, sizeof(char)*strlen(temp_string)+1+2);
00151                                         sprintf(temp_string, "%s_O", temp_string);
00152                                 }
00153                                 if (next_node->type == OUTPUT_NODE)
00154                                 {
00155                                         /* renaming for output nodes */
00156                                         temp_string2 = (char*)realloc(temp_string2, sizeof(char)*strlen(temp_string2)+1+2);
00157                                         sprintf(temp_string2, "%s_O", temp_string2);
00158                                 }
00159 
00160                                 fprintf(fp, "\t%s -> %s [label=\"%s\"];\n", temp_string, temp_string2, next_net->fanout_pins[j]->name);
00161 
00162                                 free(temp_string);
00163                                 free(temp_string2);
00164 
00165                                 /* recursive call point */
00166                                 depth_first_traverse_visualize(next_node, fp, traverse_mark_number);
00167                         }
00168                 }
00169         }
00170 }

00172 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00173  * (function: graphVizOutputCobinationalNet)
00174  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00175 void graphVizOutputCombinationalNet(char* path, char* name, short marker_value, nnode_t *current_node)
00176 {
00177         char path_and_file[4096];
00178         FILE *fp;
00179 
00180         /* open the file */
00181         sprintf(path_and_file, "%s/%s.dot", path, name);
00182         fp = fopen(path_and_file, "w");
00183 
00184         /* open graph */
00185         fprintf(fp, "digraph G {\nranksep=.25;\n");
00186         
00187         forward_traversal_net_graph_display(fp, marker_value, current_node);
00188         backward_traversal_net_graph_display(fp, marker_value, current_node);
00189 
00190         /* close graph */
00191         fprintf(fp, "}\n");
00192         fclose(fp);
00193 }

00195 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00196  * (function: forward_traversal_net_graph_display()
00197  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00198 void forward_traversal_net_graph_display(FILE *fp, short marker_value, nnode_t *node)
00199 {
00200         int j, k;
00201         nnode_t** stack_of_nodes;
00202         int index_in_stack = 0;
00203         int num_stack_of_nodes = 1;
00204         char *temp_string;
00205         char *temp_string2;
00206 
00207         stack_of_nodes = (nnode_t**)malloc(sizeof(nnode_t*)*1);
00208         stack_of_nodes[0] = node;
00209 
00210         while (index_in_stack != num_stack_of_nodes)
00211         {
00212                 nnode_t *current_node = stack_of_nodes[index_in_stack];
00213 
00214                 /* mark it */
00215                 current_node->traverse_visited = marker_value;
00216                 
00217                 /* printout the details of it */
00218                 temp_string = make_simple_name(current_node->name, "^-+.", '_');
00219                 if (index_in_stack == 0)
00220                 {
00221                         fprintf(fp, "\t%s [shape=box,color=red];\n", temp_string);
00222                 }
00223                 else if ((current_node->type == FF_NODE) || (current_node->type == BUF_NODE))
00224                 {
00225                         fprintf(fp, "\t%s [shape=box];\n", temp_string);
00226                 }
00227                 else if (current_node->type == INPUT_NODE)
00228                 {
00229                         fprintf(fp, "\t%s [shape=triangle];\n", temp_string);
00230                 }
00231                 else if (current_node->type == CLOCK_NODE)
00232                 {
00233                         fprintf(fp, "\t%s [shape=triangle];\n", temp_string);
00234                 }
00235                 else if (current_node->type == OUTPUT_NODE)
00236                 {
00237                         fprintf(fp, "\t%s_O [shape=triangle];\n", temp_string);
00238                 }
00239                 else
00240                 {
00241                         fprintf(fp, "\t%s [label=\"%d:%d\"];\n", temp_string, current_node->forward_level, current_node->backward_level);
00242                 }
00243                 free(temp_string);
00244 
00245                 /* at each node visit all the outputs */
00246                 for (j = 0; j < current_node->num_output_pins; j++)
00247                 {
00248                         if (current_node->output_pins[j] == NULL)
00249                                 continue; 
00250 
00251                         for (k = 0; k < current_node->output_pins[j]->net->num_fanout_pins; k++)
00252                         {
00253                                 if ((current_node->output_pins[j] == NULL) || (current_node->output_pins[j]->net == NULL) || ( current_node->output_pins[j]->net->fanout_pins[k] == NULL))
00254                                         continue;
00255 
00256                                 /* visit the fanout point */
00257                                 nnode_t *next_node = current_node->output_pins[j]->net->fanout_pins[k]->node;
00258 
00259                                 if (next_node == NULL)
00260                                         continue;
00261 
00262                                 temp_string = make_simple_name(current_node->name, "^-+.", '_');
00263                                 temp_string2 = make_simple_name(next_node->name, "^-+.", '_');
00264                                 if (current_node->type == OUTPUT_NODE)
00265                                 {
00266                                         /* renaming for output nodes */
00267                                         temp_string = (char*)realloc(temp_string, sizeof(char)*strlen(temp_string)+1+2);
00268                                         sprintf(temp_string, "%s_O", temp_string);
00269                                 }
00270                                 if (next_node->type == OUTPUT_NODE)
00271                                 {
00272                                         /* renaming for output nodes */
00273                                         temp_string2 = (char*)realloc(temp_string2, sizeof(char)*strlen(temp_string2)+1+2);
00274                                         sprintf(temp_string2, "%s_O", temp_string2);
00275                                 }
00276 
00277                                 fprintf(fp, "\t%s -> %s [label=\"%s\"];\n", temp_string, temp_string2, current_node->output_pins[j]->net->fanout_pins[k]->name);
00278 
00279                                 free(temp_string);
00280                                 free(temp_string2);
00281 
00282                                 if ((next_node->traverse_visited != marker_value) && (next_node->type != FF_NODE))
00283                                 {
00284                                         /* IF - not visited yet then add to list */
00285                                         stack_of_nodes = (nnode_t**)realloc(stack_of_nodes, sizeof(nnode_t*)*(num_stack_of_nodes+1));
00286                                         stack_of_nodes[num_stack_of_nodes] = next_node;
00287                                         num_stack_of_nodes ++;
00288                                 }
00289                         }
00290                 }
00291 
00292                 /* process next element in net */
00293                 index_in_stack ++;
00294         }
00295 }

00297 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00298  * (function: backward_traversal_net_graph_display()
00299  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00300 void backward_traversal_net_graph_display(FILE *fp, short marker_value, nnode_t *node)
00301 {
00302         int j;
00303         char *temp_string;
00304         char *temp_string2;
00305         nnode_t** stack_of_nodes;
00306         int index_in_stack = 0;
00307         int num_stack_of_nodes = 1;
00308 
00309         stack_of_nodes = (nnode_t**)malloc(sizeof(nnode_t*)*1);
00310         stack_of_nodes[0] = node;
00311 
00312         while (index_in_stack != num_stack_of_nodes)
00313         {
00314                 nnode_t *current_node = stack_of_nodes[index_in_stack];
00315 
00316                 /* mark it */
00317                 current_node->traverse_visited = marker_value;
00318                 
00319                 /* printout the details of it */
00320                 temp_string = make_simple_name(current_node->name, "^-+.", '_');
00321                 if (index_in_stack == 0)
00322                 {
00323                         NULL;
00324                 }
00325                 else if ((current_node->type == FF_NODE) || (current_node->type == BUF_NODE))
00326                 {
00327                         fprintf(fp, "\t%s [shape=box];\n", temp_string);
00328                 }
00329                 else if (current_node->type == INPUT_NODE)
00330                 {
00331                         fprintf(fp, "\t%s [shape=triangle];\n", temp_string);
00332                 }
00333                 else if (current_node->type == CLOCK_NODE)
00334                 {
00335                         fprintf(fp, "\t%s [shape=triangle];\n", temp_string);
00336                 }
00337                 else if (current_node->type == OUTPUT_NODE)
00338                 {
00339                         fprintf(fp, "\t%s_O [shape=triangle];\n", temp_string);
00340                 }
00341                 else
00342                 {
00343                         fprintf(fp, "\t%s [label=\"%d:%d\"];\n", temp_string, current_node->forward_level, current_node->backward_level);
00344                 }
00345                 free(temp_string);
00346 
00347                 /* at each node visit all the outputs */
00348                 for (j = 0; j < current_node->num_input_pins; j++)
00349                 {
00350                         if (current_node->input_pins[j] == NULL)
00351                                 continue; 
00352 
00353                         if ((current_node->input_pins[j] == NULL) || (current_node->input_pins[j]->net == NULL) || (current_node->input_pins[j]->net->driver_pin == NULL))
00354                                 continue;
00355 
00356                         /* visit the fanout point */
00357                         nnode_t *next_node = current_node->input_pins[j]->net->driver_pin->node;
00358 
00359                         if (next_node == NULL)
00360                                 continue;
00361 
00362                         temp_string = make_simple_name(current_node->name, "^-+.", '_');
00363                         temp_string2 = make_simple_name(next_node->name, "^-+.", '_');
00364 
00365                         fprintf(fp, "\t%s -> %s [label=\"%s\"];\n", temp_string2, temp_string, current_node->input_pins[j]->name);
00366 
00367                         free(temp_string);
00368                         free(temp_string2);
00369 
00370                         if ((next_node->traverse_visited != marker_value) && (next_node->type != FF_NODE))
00371                         {
00372                                 /* IF - not visited yet then add to list */
00373                                 stack_of_nodes = (nnode_t**)realloc(stack_of_nodes, sizeof(nnode_t*)*(num_stack_of_nodes+1));
00374                                 stack_of_nodes[num_stack_of_nodes] = next_node;
00375                                 num_stack_of_nodes ++;
00376                         }
00377                 }
00378 
00379                 /* process next element in net */
00380                 index_in_stack ++;
00381         }
00382 }
